methods.executeSystemically:
Execute the supplier with the thread's systemic importance set to the value of systemicThread.

Note: Java generics information - <T>

:param systemicThread: (boolean) - if the thread should be systemic while executing supplier
:param supplier: (java.util.function.Supplier<T>) - the operation to execute with the given value of systemicThread
:return: (T) the supplier's return value
methods.isSystemic:
Determine if an object is systemic.

 If marking is not enabled, all objects are systemic. If marking is enabled, only objects marked systemic are
 systemic.

:param o: io.deephaven.engine.util.systemicmarking.SystemicObject
:return: (boolean) true if o should be treated as systemic object.
methods.isSystemicObjectMarkingEnabled: :return: (boolean) true if systemic object marking is enabled, false otherwise.
methods.isSystemicThread: :return: (boolean) true if the current thread is creating systemic objects, false otherwise
methods.markThreadSystemic: Marks the current thread as systemically important, this is a permanent change.

text:
If enabled, marks objects as systemically important.

 When enabled, only errors from systemically important objects are treated as fatal.
